comment: BEST TEACHER EVER. I loved Korean class and she was by far the best teacher I've had at KSU. I wish she taught every subject.

Prof. Kim is one of my favorite teachers of my college career. She is super sweet, really tries to get to know her students and is always very helpful. The class moves fast and there is a lot of homework. She is a wonderful teacher, I would love it if she taught the higher level Korean classes. If you have a chance to take her class, do it,Love her

This has been the best Foreign Language class I've taken. Korean is one of my favorite cultures and she really helps you learn the language by letting you retake tests, quizzes and she is lenient on her grading. She is an all around great teacher
